name: qsv-snappy
description: Does streaming compression/decompression of the input using Google's Snappy framing format (more info).

args.name: subcommand
args.description: Subcommand to execute. Valid values: check, compress, decompress, validate

args.name: input
args.description: The input file to compress/decompress. This can be a local file, stdin, or a URL (http and https schemes supported).

options.description: Write output to <output> instead of stdout.
Show download progress bars. Only valid for URL input.
Timeout for downloading URLs in seconds.
